snippet: Timothy Sakamoto and Jochen Repolust are part of the small but growing niche making mobile apps focused on specific works of architecture.
abstract: IN-D Media founders Timothy Sakamoto and Jochen Repolust discuss how their business is part of a small but growing niche of companies making mobile apps that focus on specific works of architecture.
lead_paragraph: Timothy Sakamoto and Jochen Repolust are part of the small but growing niche making mobile apps focused on specific works of architecture.

headline.seo: Architects’ Works Find a Niche in the Digital Age — Q&A
headline.main: Architects’ Works Find a Niche in the Digital Age
headline.print_headline: Architects’ Works Find a Niche in the Digital Age
